$interpreted: Angelia: ...Is this...?
Nigel: Yes, this is the castle; the one you called home most of your life.
Izumi: Ah, but right now, it's a stronghold for us demihumans~
Izumi: I myself find this place to be very pretty, so I'm in a good mood.
Izumi: Never have I imagined that I would one day live in the Capitol of Kingdom of the Sun. It's so much fun~
Yamitsuki: Izumi, be quiet!
Izumi: Yikes~ Got Yamitsuki mad~ Sorry~
Nigel: I recruited my friends in the Slums to come here and wipe out the remaining monsters in Atlas.
Nigel: That way, the demihumans who have been living under discrimination for so long can finally come back and live here again!
Sherlock: So that's why you turned this abandoned castle into your temporary base of operations? My, my, that's some hardcore recycling~
Nigel: Now, it's my turn to ask questions. What are you guys doing here?
Naya: Hold it right there, why are you interrogating us like we're criminals? If we want to talk, maybe we should talk about how you betrayed us last time...
Angelia: Naya, stop it. I'm fine.
Angelia: I come to Atlas for the purpose of seeking out the fallen castle.
Angelia: Seeing that the castle is now under your control, I must now ask for your assistance.
Nigel: ...What do you mean? Explain yourself.
Angelia: I intend to reboot the Rayzor and use it against Theodore!
Sherlock: Eh!? Is that the reason why you coerced me to come here?
Angelia: Correct. The Rayzor was designed in the Mechanical Territory.
Angelia: Therefore, as a native of the Mechanical Territory, you're the only one I can ask to inspect the Rayzor to see if it was damaged when the castle crashed.
Nigel: He said you coerced him? You've learned to blackmail people now?
Angelia: In order to fight against Theodore, it's a choice I had to make.
Nigel: So your choice is to follow in Theodore's footsteps, take the Rayzor, massacre Theodore's forces, then take back the throne?
Angelia: I don't want to do this, but war will always have casualties no matter what...
Naya: Angel...

Nigel: Then what happens after you take back the throne?
Attack the Bears with the Rayzor? Or worse, attack Atlas again?
Angelia: NO! I would never do such things...
Nigel: And who can promise that? Maybe you're an even more ruthless tyrant than Theodore!
Nigel: If you are going to take the Rayzor, it will be over my dead body!
Izumi: Both sides, hold your horses~ I have a suggestion that offers the best of both worlds. Nigel, Princess, care to hear me out?
Sherlock: …√∞Ω∫⏚⏛∂∮≠㐃≒¶=…
Naya: Can someone understand what this guy is mumbling about?
Elio: I think...it's probably some technical terms decipherable by mechanicians.
Izumi: Well, even though I can't understand what this robot is saying~ both Nigel and princess could understand what I was saying, fortunately~
Nigel: ... Are you done thinking about it? If you want me to let you take away the Rayzor, you have to agree to the three conditions I just stated.
Angelia: Leave the blueprints behind so you know Rayzor's weaknesses and how to counter it, help you wipe out the nearby monsters...
Angelia: ...and unlock the treasure vault and gift the treasures inside to Atlas as funds for reconstruction. Right?
Naya: Hmph, so you get all the benefits and we get basically nothing...
Angelia: It's ok. I agree to your conditions.
Nigel: Been a while since I last saw you. So you now have the ability to negotiate and analyze deals now...
Nigel: Wait, Yamitsuki? What's the matter?
Izumi: Ah, Yamitsuki here is probably in a bad mood~ Is it because Nigel actually did what I said?
Nigel: ......
Sherlock: Inspection complete~ I expect no less from a design by the Mechanical Territory! Little to no damage was done to it.
Sherlock: However, it's impossible to take it away from here. You better give up on that.
Sherlock: My job is done here. See ya guys~
Angelia: No need to hurry. Your real mission is just about to begin.
Sherlock: WHAT!?
Angelia: Do you really think I didn't expect this? The Rayzor is a massive weapon. Even if the entire structure was intact, it would be difficult for me to take it away.
Angelia: Therefore, I need you to come up with an alternative plan.
Naya: Or you can go back to the Bazaar and find that you've been stripped of your vice presidency. That works for me too~
Sherlock: Meeting you people is definitely the worst thing to happen in my life! I'm certain of that now!
Sherlock: ...You can't take the whole thing away, but a modification might just work.
Angelia: Modify the Rayzor?
Sherlock: Remove the driver core from the mainframe, then modify the core into a more lightweight weapon.
Nigel: If we do that, the Rayzor's power...
Sherlock: Of course, it won't maintain its previous destructive power~
Sherlock: However, while it may no longer be the WMD capable of wiping out a country, it's still more than enough to blast several armies to kingdom come~
Angelia: Understood. Then Sir Sherlock, please proceed with the modifications.
Angelia: How much time do you need?
Sherlock: Just removing the core alone is about a whole day's work.
Angelia: A full day...

Model.Text: ...Is this...?
Yes, this is the castle; the one you called home most of your life.
Ah, but right now, it's a stronghold for us demihumans~
I myself find this place to be very pretty, so I'm in a good mood.
Never have I imagined that I would one day live in the Capitol of Kingdom of the Sun. It's so much fun~
Izumi, be quiet!
Yikes~ Got Yamitsuki mad~ Sorry~
I recruited my friends in the Slums to come here and wipe out the remaining monsters in Atlas.
That way, the demihumans who have been living under discrimination for so long can finally come back and live here again!
So that's why you turned this abandoned castle into your temporary base of operations? My, my, that's some hardcore recycling~
Now, it's my turn to ask questions. What are you guys doing here?
Hold it right there, why are you interrogating us like we're criminals? If we want to talk, maybe we should talk about how you betrayed us last time...
Naya, stop it. I'm fine.
I come to Atlas for the purpose of seeking out the fallen castle.
Seeing that the castle is now under your control, I must now ask for your assistance.
...What do you mean? Explain yourself.
I intend to reboot the Rayzor and use it against Theodore!
Eh!? Is that the reason why you coerced me to come here?
Correct. The Rayzor was designed in the Mechanical Territory.
Therefore, as a native of the Mechanical Territory, you're the only one I can ask to inspect the Rayzor to see if it was damaged when the castle crashed.
He said you coerced him? You've learned to blackmail people now?
In order to fight against Theodore, it's a choice I had to make.
So your choice is to follow in Theodore's footsteps, take the Rayzor, massacre Theodore's forces, then take back the throne?
I don't want to do this, but war will always have casualties no matter what...
Angel...

Then what happens after you take back the throne?
Attack the Bears with the Rayzor? Or worse, attack Atlas again?
NO! I would never do such things...
And who can promise that? Maybe you're an even more ruthless tyrant than Theodore!
If you are going to take the Rayzor, it will be over my dead body!
Both sides, hold your horses~ I have a suggestion that offers the best of both worlds. Nigel, Princess, care to hear me out?
Can someone understand what this guy is mumbling about?
I think...it's probably some technical terms decipherable by mechanicians.
Well, even though I can't understand what this robot is saying~ both Nigel and princess could understand what I was saying, fortunately~
... Are you done thinking about it? If you want me to let you take away the Rayzor, you have to agree to the three conditions I just stated.
Leave the blueprints behind so you know Rayzor's weaknesses and how to counter it, help you wipe out the nearby monsters...
...and unlock the treasure vault and gift the treasures inside to Atlas as funds for reconstruction. Right?
Hmph, so you get all the benefits and we get basically nothing...
It's ok. I agree to your conditions.
Been a while since I last saw you. So you now have the ability to negotiate and analyze deals now...
Wait, Yamitsuki? What's the matter?
Ah, Yamitsuki here is probably in a bad mood~ Is it because Nigel actually did what I said?
Inspection complete~ I expect no less from a design by the Mechanical Territory! Little to no damage was done to it.
However, it's impossible to take it away from here. You better give up on that.
My job is done here. See ya guys~
No need to hurry. Your real mission is just about to begin.
WHAT!?
Do you really think I didn't expect this? The Rayzor is a massive weapon. Even if the entire structure was intact, it would be difficult for me to take it away.
Therefore, I need you to come up with an alternative plan.
Or you can go back to the Bazaar and find that you've been stripped of your vice presidency. That works for me too~
Meeting you people is definitely the worst thing to happen in my life! I'm certain of that now!
...You can't take the whole thing away, but a modification might just work.
Modify the Rayzor?
Remove the driver core from the mainframe, then modify the core into a more lightweight weapon.
If we do that, the Rayzor's power...
Of course, it won't maintain its previous destructive power~
However, while it may no longer be the WMD capable of wiping out a country, it's still more than enough to blast several armies to kingdom come~
Understood. Then Sir Sherlock, please proceed with the modifications.
How much time do you need?
Just removing the core alone is about a whole day's work.
A full day...

Then Sir Sherlock, please proceed with the modifications.","sfxName":"h0021_story_023","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_015_002_dialog_english##_13_008","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How much time do you need?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_015_002_dialog_english##_13_009","SpeakerName":"Sherlock","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/r0034","IconName":"r0034s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Just removing the core alone is about a whole day's work.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_015_002_dialog_english##_13_010","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A full day...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
